title: Retrieve Additional Directorship and Dividend Information Response
description: Retrieve Additional Directorship and Dividend Information Response

companyDirector.description: Indicates whether a taxable entity is a director or not.

closeCompany.description: Indicates whether the company is a close company. This field is always returned when companyDirector is true.

directorshipCeasedDate.description: Date when the directorship ceased. This will cease the rollover across tax years for custom employments that were created for Additional Dividends and Directorship. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD

companyName.description: The name by which the company is registered with Companies House. This field is always returned when closeCompany is true.

companyNumber.description: The number by which the company is registered with Companies House. This field is always returned when closeCompany is true.

shareholding.description: The percentage shareholding of the company. This field is always returned when closeCompany is true. A value of 0 indicates no shareholding. The value must be between 0 and 100 up to 2 decimal places.

dividendReceived.description: The amount of dividends received from the company. This field is always returned when closeCompany is true. A value of 0 indicates no dividends were received. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

submittedOn.description: The date and time of the submission. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ
